Microfilm received 15 April 2004.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Pittsylvania County was formed in 1766 from Halifax County. It was named in honor of William Pitt, an English statesman.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Court Records, 1782, of Pittsylvania County Circuit Court consist of copies of orders and judgments in the suit entitled the Commonwealth of Virginia versus John Printage, Senior.

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
